original_text: Novo Nordisk A/S (NVO) Q3 2020 Earnings Call Transcript Analyst Report: Novo Nordisk A/S Novo Nordisk's (NVO) Q3 Earnings Beat Estimates, Sales Miss Novo Nordisk's operating profit increased by 6% in Danish kroner and by 7% at constant exchange rates (CER) in the first nine months of 2020
